note:
BE Project (Back to Earth Project)
aims to propose a new radical way of getting out of the crisis we are facing right now.

1st: Going back to work the land and regain total control of our surviving means. This way we completely stop depending on big corporations.

2nd: Learning meditation as the only way to survive the new inner technological colonization. Humanity have reach the inevitable self destruction point already and meditation is the cure.

Join us: www.be-project.org
